评论详情: I needed 90’s style cargo pants for an outfit. These hit the mark perfectly. Fabric was super soft, nice large pockets and stretchy waist band. I am 5’7 170 got a medium and they fit perfect. Here’s the bad side.. I obviously got a pair that had been worn and returned because the tag was cut and there was something brown smudged on the seat area.
I noticed the little elastic string that ties the botton of the pants is long so even in boots I tend to step on it or get it caught on my boots
Pants were just as described. Baggy, the length and quality of material
I liked them the material is good and the size is good I got an XL and am 5’7 220 pounds so it fit good and even though I got shorts instead of pants they are nice
My tween loves them. The fabric feels silky and the cut is exactly that cargo baggie look she was looking for. If your child is happy then you're happy

These pants give 90s throwback vibes and I'm here for it. They are lightweight and comfortable and can be worn with pretty much anything. I have so far paired these with a crop top and a bodysuit and the pants looked great in both configurations. Good material at a decent price.

These pants fit true to size. They have the goth girly look to them that one of our girls love. She wears them with a baby pink crop top and the two pieces work together so well. They are stylish and well made. Plus you get them at a good price. Very pleased.
I love these cargo pants. The material is nice and breathable. They are true to size and super comfy.
i love these pants they are long and baggy just like the picture.

These are like the best cargo pants I have ever was. They're probably the comfiest I've ever warn too. The material used for these in particular is like super super soft. I think the color is really pretty. I love the pockets on the sides/front of the pants they have a little draw string you can pull to tighten them which adds a kind of scrunchy like look that I think really nice. I love these so much my only complaint is that there's only a back pocket on the right side and not also on the left side. I highly highly recommend these!!

I'm wearing these pants as I write this and I LOVE them. They fit perfect and have a little stretch in the waistband. The pockets have buttons on the sides to keep your items secure. I love that you can also tie them at the bottom. They have belt loops as well. The zipper feels super durable and so far they've also been very easy to keep clean- I got these in black and have a white dog that sheds but these were no problem with a once-over with the lint roller.

I love this style! I really enjoy how these pants are thin and keep me cooler. Lots of pockets to choose from and an elastic waist band to help accommodate different comfort levels and sizes. The black color goes with everything as well. Super hip style, nice quality, and great value!

Love these parachute pants mainly because of how light they are. I find them to be very comfortable and stylish at the same time. My size fit perfect and the material is nice as well. It’s soft. Nice pants.
